title: 180: Creating a Lasting Change with Jessica Ortner
description:
How can you eliminate fear and create lasting change? 

If you have ever felt anxious, afraid, or overwhelmed with emotion, like most of us, this episode is certainly for you. Today we will learn a way to calm our anxiety and our bodies, so we don’t have to be ruled by old experiences.

In this episode, we welcome our special guest, New York Times best-selling author, Jessica Ortner. Jessica is a long time friend, and we are excited to have her on to discuss mindset as part of our “Limitless Together” series. Her latest book, The Tapping Solution to Creating Lasting Change, is a guide to help you to eliminate negative internal language, fears, uncertainty, procrastination, and more to be able to create lasting change finally.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
